column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Judy - Thank you for such a comprehensive review! I'm glad to know we met your satisfaction in many regards
column2: and we hope to meet that same standard for future visits. We are familiar with the folks who opened the JINYA franchise in Atlanta
column3: so we're glad to know you enjoyed your dining experience there
column4: as well. Thank you again for the kind words
column5: and we look forward to serving you again soon.
